channel.title: Making the Pest Control Points Lower [317]
channel.description: Ok, my server requires 250 points to get full void in the pest control minigame. I changed it once to 125 but I compiledand went to the pc minigame on my server to see if it worked and it did, I just realized that it gives you 2 pints per game, so thats like 63 games for full void :( where would I go in to change the point requirements?? :confused:

item.title: Making the Pest Control Points Lower [317]
item.dc:creator: @killaxrich killaxrich
item.description:
@killaxrich wrote:

where can i change the point cost? thats what im looking for…

Read full topic

item.title: Making the Pest Control Points Lower [317]
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

search

if(PlayerHandler.portal1 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal2 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal3 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal4 == 1 && inGame){

Your code will look like this:

if(PlayerHandler.portal1 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal2 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal3 == 1 && PlayerHandler.portal4 == 1 && inGame){ inGame = false; resetpc(); pcPoints += 2;

change this 2 in pcPoints += 2; to whatever you want it to be. Good luck =)

Read full topic
item.source: Making the Pest Control Points Lower [317]
